title.zh: 武汉：左钰洁被评为华中科技大学自强之星
title.en: Wuhan: Yujie (Ruby) Zuo Named Self-Improvement Star at HUST

subtitle.zh: 数学与统计学院自强之星
subtitle.en: Self-Improvement Star of School of Mathematics and Statistics

description.zh: 血友姐妹会的负责人左钰洁被评为华中科技大学数学与统计学院自强之星。这一荣誉表彰了她在学术学习和社会公益方面的突出表现，特别是在血友病女性关爱领域的开创性工作。作为一名大学生，她将专业知识与社会责任相结合，为推动血友病女性群体的关注和支持做出了重要贡献。
description.en: Yujie (Ruby) Zuo, leader of the Hemophilia Sisters team, was named Self-Improvement Star of the School of Mathematics and Statistics at Huazhong University of Science and Technology. This honor recognizes her outstanding performance in academic studies and social welfare, particularly her pioneering work in hemophilia women's care. As a college student, she combines professional knowledge with social responsibility, making important contributions to promoting attention and support for the female hemophilia community.

title.zh: 微信公众号：自强之星获奖报道
